feature.label: Triquetrum core feature
feature.description:
The scientific workflow execution engine, which includes the core of Ptolemy II and the Triquetrum task-based processing facility.
Ptolemy II is an open-source software framework supporting experimentation with actor-oriented design. Actors are software components that execute concurrently and communicate through messages sent via interconnected ports.
The goal of the task-based processing model is to be able to represent a work item, to trace the progress of its processing and to represent the obtained results.
